entry.title: Millbrook - Buckwheat Flour - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: MillBrook
Type: FOOD
Price: 28.99

Details

This Millbrook gluten free potato starch will help you keep your pantry well-stocked with the essentials! Made from the starch of fresh potatoes, this dense powdery product is widely used for a variety of culinary applications. Potato starch is similar to corn starch and can be used as a replacement for corn starch in many recipes. It also has a higher heat tolerance than corn starch, making it perfect for thickening sauces, soups, and stews, in addition to puddings, pie fillings, and gravies. Use 4 tsp. of potato starch to substitute for every 1 Tbsp. of corn starch; when using it to thicken a liquid, mix the potato starch with a small amount of water to make a slurry before stirring it in to your recipe to help prevent clumping. 

Beyond thickening, potato starch also has numerous uses in baking. It helps add moistness to cakes, cookies, and other baked goods. It's also a key ingredient in shortbread recipes, where its fine texture produces crumbly and tender breads! Potato starch is also great for helping to produce a crispy texture in your sauteed or stir-fried meats and vegetables; coat small pieces of your desired ingredient in potato starch to produce a crispy coating. It's also the secret ingredient in the batter of extra-crispy deep fried foods! Add potato starch to the batter of your fried fish, onion rings, or any other food you want to fry up with a crispy, golden-brown coating. It's especially popular as an ingredient in crispy-yet-moist Japanese Karaage chicken. No matter how you use it, this potato starch is sure to be a key ingredient in your busy kitchen; this bulk 10 Kg supply will keep you well-stocked for all of your culinary needs!

entry.title: Millbrook - Organic Light Spelt Flour Stone Ground - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: MillBrook
Type: FOOD
Price: 42.99

Details

Add a versatile and healthy ancient grain to your pantry with this Millbrook spelt flour! Spelt is a primitive relative of modern wheat and is one of the oldest cultivated grains; some evidence suggests that humans have been growing and eating it for as long as 8000 years. Though modern wheat has been more widely cultivated than spelt for centuries, spelt is gaining popularity as a healthy alternative to traditional wheat flours! Because it is related to wheat, spelt flour contains gluten, but the gluten proteins in spelt are more water soluble than those in wheat, making it easier to digest. This means that spelt flour should not be eaten by people with celiac disease or severe gluten sensitivities, though some people with wheat allergies and mild gluten sensitivities report that spelt is more easy to digest than flour. Its unique genetic structure also makes spelt flour a great source of protein and essential minerals including manganese, zinc, and copper! 
Because of its similarity to wheat, spelt flour can be used in practically any recipe that calls for all-purpose or wheat flour. Spelt adds a uniquely nutty flavor and a light texture to your baked goods! Spelt can generally be substituted for 50% of the wheat flour in a recipe, though if you have not used it before, you may want to start out by substituting 25% spelt flour and working your way up as you become more familiar with it. It's especially good for use in breads, pancakes, and cookies! No matter how you choose to use it, this ancient grain will add delicious flavor and wholesome nutrition to baked goods in your restaurant, bakery or cafe. This 10 Kg bag will keep you well-stocked for all of your culinary needs!

Add a versatile and healthy ancient grain to your pantry with this Millbrook spelt flour! Spelt is a primitive relative of modern wheat and is one of the oldest cultivated grains; some evidence suggests that humans have been growing and eating it for as long as 8000 years. Though modern wheat has been more widely cultivated than spelt for centuries, spelt is gaining popularity as a healthy alternative to traditional wheat flours! Because it is related to wheat, spelt flour contains gluten, but the gluten proteins in spelt are more water soluble than those in wheat, making it easier to digest. Its unique genetic structure also makes spelt flour a great source of protein and essential minerals including manganese, zinc, and copper! Plus, like all whole grain flours, this spelt flour is high in dietary fiber, promoting healthy digestion.

Because of its similarity to wheat, spelt flour can be used in practically any recipe that calls for all-purpose or whole wheat flour. Spelt adds a uniquely nutty flavor and a light texture to your baked goods! Spelt can generally be substituted for 50% of the wheat flour in a recipe, though if you have not used it before, you may want to start out by substituting 25% spelt flour and working your way up as you become more familiar with it. It's especially good for use in breads, pancakes, and cookies! No matter how you choose to use it, this ancient grain will add delicious flavor and wholesome nutrition to baked goods in your restaurant, bakery or cafe. entry.title: Millbrook - Potato Flour - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: MillBrook
Type: FOOD
Price: 63.99

Details

Create deliciously moist baked goods, hearty soups and sauces, and other gluten-free delights with this Millbrook potato flour! This flour is made from russet potatoes that are peeled, trimmed, cooked, and ground into a fine powder. Potato flour retains some of the flavor and color of the potatoes it's made with, so it's great for adding a touch of hearty color and savory, earthy flavor to your baked goods! Because this flour is made with whole potatoes, it offers great nutritional benefits: potatoes are a great source of fiber, B vitamins, and iron. Best of all, this potato flour is certified gluten-free, making it a great substitute for flour as a thickener and a great addition to gluten-free flour blends. This product is a great way to produce menu items that your customers with dietary restrictions can enjoy!

This versatile potato flour makes it easy to create baked goods and menu items that are full of hearty flavor! A bit of potato flour mixed into yeast breads will add irresistible moisture, savory flavor, and a light beige color. It's particularly well suited to gluten-free flour blends, where its absorbency makes it perfect for adding moisture to breads, scones, muffins, and other baked goods that may otherwise turn out dry. Try adding a dash of potato flour to your pancake or waffle batter to create breakfast items that are dense, fluffy, and satisfying! Its thickening properties also make it a great substitute for gluten-based flours in soups, gravies, and sauces.

To use this potato flour to thicken your dishes, make a slurry of flour and cool water before whisking into hot liquid. Making a slurry beforehand ensures that your soup, sauce, or gravy will be smooth, with no unpleasant lumps of potato flour. No matter how you choose to use it, this versatile potato flour is sure to become a favorite in your busy kitchen! This bulk 10 Kg supply will keep you well-stocked for all of your culinary needs.

ADM - Whole Wheat Flour No ADA - 20 Kg

ADM offers the most comprehensive portfolio of tried-and-true flours and on-trend specialty milled ingredients, all backed by over a century of milling experience. Targeted Functional Benefits with Wheat and Whole Wheat Flours

entry.title: Brant - Dark Rye Flour - 20 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brant
Type: FOOD
Price: 32.99

 

Brant - Dark Rye Flour - 20 Kg

Fine 100% whole flour.

Is there anything better than a fresh loaf of rustic rye bread with a hearty crust and a tender interior that's still warm from the oven? Serve your customers the very best when you bake with Brant organic dark rye flour! Made from whole-grain rye berries, this flour is ground on Brant traditional quartz stone mills. This Old World grinding technique produces full-flavored flour and also helps to preserve the beneficial nutrients - including fiber, iron, and potassium - that are found in the germ, bran, and endosperm of the rye berry. This flour helps you create wholesome baked goods that are packed with whole-grain health benefits and full of deep, hearty, distinctive rye flavor!

Use this organic dark rye flour to create unforgettable artisan breads and baked goods! Your customers are sure to love the flavor it gives to traditional rye bread; whether you use it to create house-made reuben sandwiches or include slices in your bread service, the rye bread that you bake with this flour will stand out from the crowd. This flour is also perfect for creating rich, deeply flavorful pumpernickel bread, or you can use it to add depth of flavor to your signature breads. It's also a great flour for feeding sourdough starter! Beyond breads, this dark rye flour can be included in a variety of other baked goods. It's a great addition to pizza and pie crusts, cookies, cakes, muffins, scones, or crackers! No matter how you choose to use it, this Brant organic dark rye flour is sure to become a staple ingredient in your bakery, restaurant, or cafe. This 20 Kg. bag will keep you in good supply for all of your culinary needs!

entry.title: Millbrook - Organic Quinoa Flour - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: MillBrook
Type: FOOD
Price: 126.99

 

Millbrook  - Quinoa Flour - 10 Kgk

Quinoa flour works well as a nutritious addition to all-purpose flour in many recipes, or as a substitute for wheat flour in your baked creations.

Try substituting this quinoa flour for half of the all-purpose or whole wheat flour that recipes call for to add healthy benefits and complex flavor to your baked goods! You can also use quinoa flour on its own or mix it with other gluten-free flours to create treats for your patrons with gluten sensitivities or celiac disease.

When used alone, quinoa flour has a very distinct taste and slightly gritty texture, so it's best used with bold flavors like cinnamon, cardamom, cumin, and coriander. This quinoa flour is perfect for creating delicious, gluten-free banana bread, pancakes, muffins, or scones! No matter how you choose to use it, this quinoa flour is sure to become a favorite ingredient in your kitchen

entry.title: Bob's Red Mill - Oat Flour Gluten Free - 623 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bob's Red Mill
Type: FOOD
Price: 9.99

 Bob's Red Mill  - Oat Flour Gluten Free - 623 g

Add a delicious, nutrient dense, and gluten free flour to your pantry with this Bob's Red Mill gluten free oat flour! This flour is produced in Bob's Red Mill's designated gluten-free facility, where all products undergo rigorous testing to ensure that they aren't cross-contaminated with gluten, so you can feel confident that you're offering the very best to your patrons with celiac disease, gluten sensitivities, or wheat allergies.

It's made by grinding the highest quality whole grain oats into a fine-textured flour that's flecked throughout with dark pieces of the nutritious oat bran. This flour is loaded with all of the nutritional benefits of whole grain oats: it's high in dietary fiber and low in saturated fat, meaning it has a low glycemic index that helps to regulate blood sugar and keep you feeling fuller longer. Eating oat flour is great for those with heart disease, diabetes, high cholesterol, or anyone who is looking to lose weight or eat a more nutritious diet!

In addition to its nutritional benefits, Bob's Red Mill gluten free oat flour also brings a delicious flavor and irresistible texture to your signature baked goods! It adds a hearty taste that is slightly deeper and more rich than that of traditional wheat flours without overpowering your other ingredients, and its high fiber content makes it a great binder in gluten-free flour mixes.

Oat flour can add a light fluffiness to the texture of normally heavy baked goods like bran muffins, carrot cake, and zucchini bread. It's also an excellent ingredient to include in the batter for your gluten-free pancakes or waffles! Even if you're not using oat flour for gluten-free baking, you can substitute it for 1/4 of the all-purpose or whole wheat flours in your signature recipes to add depth of flavor and nutritional benefits. No matter how you choose to use it, Bob's Red Mill gluten free oat flour is sure to make your baked goods stand out from the crowd!

entry.title: P&H - #3 Durum Semolina Flour Sooji - 20 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&H
Type: FOOD
Price: 44.99

P&H - #3 Durum Semolina Flour Sooji - 20 Kg

  • Durum wheat semolina
  • Excellent source of fibre and iron
  • Rava

Create authentic pasta dishes in your Italian restaurant or pizzeria with this 20 Kg. semolina flour. This versatile flour is ideal for making dried pastas, couscous, or Italian-style breads. Or, cook slowly with milk and sugar to create a traditional milk pudding dish topped with a spoonful of honey or fresh fruit. Not just for Italian restaurants, semolina flour is a staple in many middle eastern and Indian cuisines as well! Use to prepare classic dishes, such as sooji upma for breakfast or namoura, a type of semolina cake, for dessert.

Milled from the endosperm of durum wheat into a finely ground flour, it has a coarse texture with a nutty, sweet flavor. Typically, it has a pale yellow color, due to the presence of carotenoids in the flour. With its high gluten and protein content, it has great resistance and elasticity, which gives pasta the ability to hold its shape when cooking. You can also use it to sprinkle on a baking sheet or pizza peel to avoid items from sticking. However you use it, this semolina flour makes a great addition to any commercial kitchen!

entry.title: Millbrook - Brown Rice Flour Stone Ground - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: MillBrook
Type: FOOD
Price: 29.99

Millbrook - Brown Rice Flour Stone Ground - 10 Kg

Add a delicious and nutritious flour to your bakery's pantry with this Millbrook brown rice flour! This flour is made from whole grain brown rice that is carefully stone ground to produce a perfect texture and preserve the nutrients found in the bran and germ of rice kernels. While some rice flours can be gritty, Millbrook brown rice flour is especially fine and produces baked goods with a delightful texture! In addition to being high in essential nutrients like protein and fiber, this brown rice flour is gluten free, so it's suitable for serving to customers with dietary restrictions.

When used alone, rice flour can be difficult to work with and may produce a dry crumbly texture in your baked goods, so it's best used in conjunction with other wheat or gluten-free flours. Oat flour, buckwheat flour, almond flour, and garbanzo bean flour are all great additions to your gluten-free flour mix! This brown rice flour will lend a light texture and nutty flavor to your breads, muffins, pancakes, or other baked goods. It's also great to use as a gluten-free thickener for soups, stews, and gravies, or a breading for fried, grilled, or sauteed foods. No matter how you choose to use it, this brown rice flour is sure to become a staple in your kitchen; this bulk 10 Kg bag will keep you in good supply for all of your culinary needs! For optimal freshness, refrigerate or freeze this flour after opening.

entry.title: Millbrook - White Rice Flour Stone Ground - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: MillBrook
Type: FOOD
Price: 29.99

Millbrook - White Rice Flour Stone Ground - 10 Kg

Add a delicious and versatile flour to your bakery's pantry with this Millbrook white rice flour! This flour is made from pure glutinous white rice; though its name implies that this rice variety contains gluten, it actually refers to the rice's "sticky" qualities that mimic the behavior of gluten. This product is naturally gluten free and produced in Millbrook gluten free facility, so it's suitable for serving to customers with dietary restrictions! While some rice flours can be gritty, Millbrook white rice flour is especially fine and produces baked goods with a delightful texture!

When used alone, rice flour can be difficult to work with and may produce a dry crumbly texture in your baked goods, so it's best used in conjunction with other wheat or gluten-free flours. Oat flour, buckwheat flour, almond flour, and garbanzo bean flour are all great additions to your gluten-free flour mix! This white rice flour will lend a light, delicate sponginess to your breads, muffins, pancakes, or other baked goods. It's also great to use as a gluten-free thickener for soups, stews, and gravies. No matter how you choose to use it, this brown rice flour is sure to become a staple in your kitchen; this bulk 10 Kg bag will keep you in good supply for all of your culinary needs! For optimal freshness, refrigerate or freeze this flour after opening.

A leading brand in health foods, Bob's Red Mill is dedicated to providing the best products using the Old World technique of traditional stone milling. This technique allows for the inherent nutrients and flavor of their grains to be preserved, thus providing wholesome, quality foods to your kitchen. Plus, they have a separate 100% gluten free facility where they process, package, and test all of their gluten free products, so you can always be sure you are serving your customers with allergies a safe-to-eat product. Offer delicious and equally nutritious foods in your establishment with the help of Bob's Red Mill.
